snippet: The video of the journalist Austin Tice was publicized by a Web site that supports President Bashar al-Assad, and its authenticity could not be confirmed.
abstract: Web site supporting Syrian government publicizes a video clip showing Austin Tice, American freelance journalist, to be alive but held hostage by what appear to be Islamist militants; it is the first glimpse of Tice since August 13.
lead_paragraph: The video of the journalist Austin Tice was publicized by a Web site that supports President Bashar al-Assad, and its authenticity could not be confirmed.

headline.seo: Austin Tice Seen Alive in Video on Pro-Assad Web Site
headline.main: Video Seems to Show American Journalist Being Held by Islamists in Syria
headline.print_headline: Video Seems to Show American Journalist Being Held by Islamists in Syria
